icarus.message: Port with type `string` is not supported
icarus.notes: Icarus doesn't support string type ports

classification.reason: Valid IEEE 1800 syntax accepted by slang and Verilator. CIRCT crashes instead of providing proper error message. Even if unsupported, should emit diagnostic, not crash.

recommendation: Report as bug. CIRCT should either support string-typed ports or emit a proper error message instead of crashing with an assertion failure.
